newsitem.title: NIGERIA: Nigerian 10-day T-bonds sell at three pct.
newsitem.headline: Nigerian 10-day T-bonds sell at three pct.

text.p: Nigeria's Central Bank said on Friday it sold 365 million naira worth of 10-day treasury bonds at a weighted average rate of three percent.
Bids totalled the same amount and the true yield will be 3.0025 percent.
Last week the central bank sold 30 million naira worth of 10-day treasury bonds at a weighted average rate of 3.0025 percent.
The central bank also said that on the primary market, 91-day treasury bills worth eight billion naira were sold at a marginal rate of 3.5000 percent and true yield of 4.039 percent.
